name: VR Escape Game 2
description:
Escape from the room.
The Second VR escape game.
This is longer than the previous game.

Be sure to try the free VR Escape Game and make sure it works on your device before you buy this app.

Watch the spots where the point becomes the circle.

You can play with VR goggles or without goggles.
When you play, you do not need to touch the screen.
You can goal only by watching.

You can select move mode from two modes, Teleport Mode or Walk Mode.

If you use VR goggles,
be careful about VR sickness
and check your surroundings to play safely.

Images or sounds by

- Silhouette Design
http://kage-design.com/

- Arrows Design
http://yajidesign.com/

- Ayaemo lab
http://ayaemo.skr.jp/

- Icooon mono
http://icooon-mono.com/

- Sound effect lab
http://soundeffect-lab.info/

- Maou damashii
http://maoudamashii.jokersounds.com/

- Sound dictionary
http://sounddictionary.info/

[Caution]
Do not play this game with standing.
Please be sure to sit down and play.
When you wear VR goggles, you cannot see your surroundings.
Make sure there are no dangerous objects around, and that it is safe to look around with the VR goggles on before you play.
The developer is not responsible for any disadvantage incurred by the user by playing this application.
